displayUnequipped.name: Display Unequipped
displayUnequipped.hint: Whether to display unequipped Items in the Inventory tab or not. (client setting)

groupGear.name: Group Gear
groupGear.hint: Whether to display Gear grouped into tabs by category. If disabled, Gear types will display as lists. (client setting)

maxCharacters.name: Max Characters
maxCharacters.hint: Maximum number of characters displayed in Action names. Set 0 to disable trimming. (client setting)

displayActivityIcon.name: Display Activities
displayActivityIcon.hint: Whether to display icon denoting presence of Activity on an Item. (client setting)

showOnlyPrepared.name: Show Only Prepared
showOnlyPrepared.hint: Whether to only show Prepared Spells. (client setting)

showPreparedness.name: Show Preparedness
showPreparedness.hint: Whether to display icon denoting if a Spell is Prepared. (client setting)
